pkgmetadata.longdescription: The `clvm_rs` wheel has python bindings for the rust implementation of clvm.Build-----Use `maturin` to build the python interface. First, install into current virtualenv with```$ pip install maturin```While in the `wheel` directory, build `clvm_rs` into the current virtualenv with```$ maturin develop --release```On UNIX-based platforms, you may get a speed boost on `sha256` operations by buildingwith OpenSSL.```$ maturin develop --release --features=openssl```To build the wheel, do```$ maturin build --release````or```$ maturin build --release --features=openssl```
